short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Surf Secure allow parents to customize the default search settings based on user profiles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Surf Secure updates default search settings to allow for separate parents and kids profiles.

Surf Secure provides parents a simple way to make sure their kids are searching the internet via a properly filtered search engine when the search is made from the address bar.

After the extension is installed, parents will need to setup a PIN to access or switch back from kids to parent profile. The PIN protects from kids accidentally switching to parent profile and
being exposed to inappropriate content on the internet while searching from the address bar.

Extension uses Yahoo as search engine for parent profile and Kiddle is used as the search engine for kids profile.
